column2: The students in the group of 3-4 will read research papers in which information retrieval methods such as
Index  construction,  Query  Processing,  tolerant  retrieval,  vector  space  modeling,  probabilistic  information
retrieval, Link Analysis etc are utilized to solve research related problems. The students will implement the
research  papers  using  a  standard  dataset  taken  from  the  platforms  like  Kaggle,  Github,  UCI,  KDD  etc.
Applying  the  methods  on  standard  dataset  will  enable  the  students  in  enhancing  their  understanding  and
